鱗傷.definition: cuts and bruises like fish scales; terribly cut up

鱗喉綠啄木鳥.pinyin: lín hóu lǜ zhuó mù niǎo
鱗喉綠啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) streak-throated woodpecker (Picus xanthopygaeus)

鱗翅.definition: scaly wing; Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)

鱗翅目.definition: Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)

鱗胸鷦鶥.definition: (bird species of China) scaly-breasted cupwing; scaly-breasted wren-babbler (Pnoepyga albiventer)

鱗腹綠啄木鳥.pinyin: lín fù lǜ zhuó mù niǎo
鱗腹綠啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) scaly-bellied woodpecker (Picus squamatus)
